Plot: An airborne Boeing 747 is headed to London when, without any warning, passengers mysteriously disappear from their seats. Terror and chaos slowly spread not only through the plane but also worldwide as unusual events continue to unfold. For those who have been left behind, the apocalypse has just begun...
Characters: The Anti-Christ, Nicolae Carpathia, Rayford Steele, Cameron "Buck" Williams, Bruce Barnes
Setting: Illinois (United States), New York City, New York (United States), Mount Prospect, Illinois (United States), Chicago, Illinois (United States)
